name: Time Boxes
description:
This game was a submission to the 3rd Nokia 3310 Game Jam, where you have to make the game in the limitations of the Nokia 3310 phone, which meant you can only use the 2 green color variants, up to 12 keys only, monophobic sound (which means you can't have 2 sounds playing at once), and having the game be in 84x48 game resolution.

All of the assets were made by me, apart from the sound effects where i used the bfxvr sound effect generator which you can find here: https://www.bfxr.net/

I'll most likely not be updating this game, as this was just a fun little game i wanted to make for the game jam.

You can also find me at:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/notOfflical

YouTube: https://bit.ly/2CCbV4u

and if you really wanna get in contact with me, you can also find me on discord: Offlical#6224
